statements: SELECT * FROM compost_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM compost_materials WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, material_name, compost_date FROM compost_materials ORDER BY compost_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'apple%';
SELECT id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM compost_materials GROUP BY id;
SELECT id, material_name, quantity, compost_date FROM compost_materials;
SELECT * FROM compost_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM compost_materials WHERE compost_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, material_name, quantity, compost_date FROM compost_materials WHERE material_name ILIKE 'wood%' ORDER BY compost_date;
SELECT id, material_name, quantity, compost_date FROM compost_materials WHERE material_name = 'leaves' OR quantity < 50 ORDER BY quantity ASC, compost_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM compost_materials WHERE quantity > 100.00;
SELECT material_name FROM compost_materials WHERE material_name = 'Leaves';
SELECT * FROM compost_bins ORDER BY bin_id DESC;
SELECT bin_location, material_name FROM compost_bins JOIN compost_materials ON compost_bins.material_id = compost_materials.id;
SELECT * FROM compost_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM compost_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT bin_id, bin_location, material_name FROM compost_bins INNER JOIN compost_materials ON compost_bins.material_id = compost_materials.id;
SELECT * FROM compost_bins WHERE material_id IN (SELECT id FROM compost_materials WHERE quantity > 100);

SELECT bin_location, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM compost_bins INNER JOIN compost_materials ON compost_bins.material_id = compost_materials.id GROUP BY bin_location ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM compost_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity FROM compost_materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT bin_name, capacity FROM compost_bins WHERE capacity < 50;
SELECT activity_date, quantity_used FROM compost_activities WHERE activity_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM compost_materials WHERE material_type = 'Organic';
SELECT * FROM compost_materials;
SELECT bin_name, capacity FROM compost_bins WHERE capacity > 100;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM compost_materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT material_type FROM compost_materials;
SELECT activity_date, quantity_used FROM compost_activities WHERE bin_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM CompostMaterials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM CompostMaterials WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT bin_location, bin_capacity FROM CompostBins WHERE bin_capacity >= 100;
SELECT log_id, material_id, quantity_added, timestamp FROM CompostingLogs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM CompostUsers WHERE username LIKE 'alice%';
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM CompostMaterials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM CompostMaterials WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity FROM CompostMaterials WHERE material_type LIKE '%organic%' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM CompostingLogs JOIN CompostMaterials ON CompostingLogs.material_id = CompostMaterials.material_id ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM CompostUsers WHERE username LIKE '%john%' OR email LIKE '%example.com';
SELECT * FROM compost_materials;
SELECT material_name, carbon_content, nitrogen_content FROM compost_materials;
SELECT * FROM compost_bins WHERE current_fill_level > 50;
SELECT site_name, location FROM compost_sites WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM compost_users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM compost_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT id, material_name, carbon_content, nitrogen_content FROM compost_materials WHERE carbon_content > 2.5;
SELECT site_id, site_name, location FROM compost_sites WHERE location LIKE '%Garden%';
SELECT bin_id, bin_capacity, current_fill_level, material_name FROM compost_bins JOIN compost_materials ON compost_bins.material_id = compost_materials.id;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM compost_users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' ORDER BY username ASC;
